posts.title: RRRevolution! Girl Style! Now!
posts.text: What’s a zine? And who are Riot Grrrls? Learn about NYPL's zine collection as well as books that will let you take a deep dive into zines, the Riot Grrrl movement and how they intersect.

posts.title: New Year, New You: Resources for Teens
posts.text: A group of YA librarians teamed up to put on a series of programs for teens aimed at setting themselves up for success in the new year. Here are some additional book recommendations and resources related to the topics they presented including financial literacy, mental health, and building habits.
